attributes.additional_details: the government is in chaos and unable to govern. There is no confidence either within the government or the population that the current administration is capable of uniting and providing stable government. We have the right to ask for better than this and to choose a new administration
attributes.background: dissolve parliament and go to the UK population to ask who they want to govern

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
